productPage.addYourComplement: Add a complement to your order

userPanel.name: Name
userPanel.noOrders: You don’t have any orders yet
userPanel.logoutConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to log out?
userPanel.logoutConfirmText: If you log out you'll need to re-enter your credentials.

0.a: Yes, we offer same-day delivery for orders placed before 4:00 PM within our delivery area.

1.q: Can I schedule a delivery for a specific date and time?
1.a: Absolutely, you can select the delivery date and time slot during checkout.

2.q: What happens if the recipient is not at home?
2.a: We will contact the recipient to arrange a new delivery or leave the order in a safe place, according to your instructions.

3.q: Can I add a note or dedication to my order?
3.a: Yes, you can write a personalized dedication that we will deliver with your flowers.

4.q: What payment methods do you accept?
4.a: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and other secure online payment methods.

5.q: How can I keep my flowers fresh for longer?
5.a: We recommend cutting the stems diagonally, changing the water every two days, and avoiding direct sunlight.

6.q: Can I modify or cancel my order?
6.a: If you need to modify or cancel your order, please contact us as soon as possible. We will do our best to help you.

7.a: Yes, you can contact us to request a fully customized floral arrangement.

checkout.name: Name
checkout.billingCheckbox: This address will also be used for billing. You can enter another if needed.
checkout.cardholderNamePlaceholder: Name as it appears on card
checkout.securePayment: 100% secure payment. Your data is protected.

deliveryAreas.title: Delivery Areas
deliveryAreas.description: At Flower Power, we offer fresh flower delivery services in the following areas. If your location is not listed, please contact us to check availability.

areas.0: Madrid city and metropolitan area - Same day delivery available
areas.1: Rest of the Peninsula - Delivery within 24-48 hours
areas.2: Balearic and Canary Islands - Delivery within 48-72 hours

deliveryTimes.title: Delivery Times
deliveryTimes.description: Our delivery times vary depending on the type of order and location. All orders are processed and prepared with the utmost care to ensure your flowers arrive fresh and beautiful.

shippingCosts.title: Shipping Costs
shippingCosts.description: Our shipping costs depend on the delivery location and the type of service selected. For orders over €60, we offer free shipping on standard deliveries within Madrid city.

specialInstructions.title: Special Instructions
specialInstructions.description: To ensure successful delivery of your flowers, please consider the following:

instructions.0: Provide a valid contact phone number for the recipient in case our delivery person needs to get in touch.
instructions.1: If delivery is to an office, please indicate the company name and department.
instructions.2: For hospital deliveries, please check in advance if they allow flowers and provide the room number.
instructions.3: If no one is available to receive the order, we will try to leave it in a safe place or with a neighbor, according to your instructions.
